description: At the Colossus Ruins at the Desert Resort in the Unova region, an ancient egg hatched and a Raid Battle ensued against Ash Ketchum, Goh, Shame_Seeker, Kira and Excavation Leader. Goh ended up being the one to catch it. Golurk are normally only 9 feet tall but this one was almost double that size. The Golurk was the ancient cityâ€™s protection, built by people around the Colossus Ruins and Golurk would only awaken to fight and would attack anything it saw.
name: Goloog (Gou)
